title: Sound On: Vaccine Policy, Infrastructure
itunes:title: Sound On: Vaccine Policy, Infrastructure
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: Bloomberg Supreme Court reporter Greg Stohr, Bloomberg Politics Contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, Republican Strategist Jennifer Nassour, and Rep. Ralph Norman, a Republican representing South Carolina's 5th congressional district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
